title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE MAYOR NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO AN AGREEMENT WITH ASSOCIATION OF MUNICIPAL EMPLOYEES OF LOS BANOS - LAGUNA; LOS BANOS SAFETY TEAM; PHILIPPINE RED CROSS; UNITED KABALIKAT CIVICOM; UROCOM; 2428 GROCERS; LOS BANOS EMPLOYEES MULTI-PURPOSE COOPERATIVE; 5 M'S EVENT CATERING SERVICES; AND JP MERCHANDISING AS VOLUNTEERSâ€™ PARTNERS TO STRENGTHEN THE MUNICIPAL DISASTER RISK REDUCTION AND MANAGEMENT PROGRAM (MDRRMP) OF THE MYNICIPAL GOVERNMENT.
